Draft Guidelines Now Available for Public Review and Comment through August 2, 2024

OPRHP Releases for Public Review and Comment Draft Eligibility Guidelines

The New York State Office of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation today released for public review and comment draft eligibility guidelines to support open space land conservation and recreation infrastructure projects
